name: Donut Land Invasion
description:
Help Warbler destroy the monsters invading the swamp by using donuts to fight! You must destroy all 10 monsters to win the game.

Controls:

  • Move the player with the arrow keys or WASD.
  • Shoot by clicking the left mouse button.
  • Alternatively move the player with voice controls (say "left", "right", "up", or "down).
